attributes.action: All evidence re covid19 matters public on link on .gov.uk front page & no delay.
attributes.additional_details: As covid19 has & continues to have a massive impacts in our society. The UK public need complete honesty & transparency about the all: ' evidence, decision making, the sources & references of the evidence, pier viewed medical&scientific journal studies & articles & all warnings & evidence ignored, funding, conflicts of interests, minutes'. UK gov are asked by the people to urgently provide all this evidence on a persistent & prominant weblink at the top of the front page of the .gov.uk website.
attributes.background:
Publish all covid evidence inc. but not limited to all:prevention,treatments,pier reviewed medical&scientific journal articles&studies inc.pandemics,impacts, masks&social dist.,businesses.
All 'UKgov,plans,decisions,laws,legalisation,policy,guidance, statements re covid19' &all changes & warnings.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Scientific evidence considered by the Scientific Advisory Group for Emergencies (SAGE) and supporting the Government's response to COVID-19 is published online at: 
https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/scientific-evidence-supporting-the-government-response-to-coronavirus-covid-19

Updates to Government guidance, Government announcements, information on Government support, and other information is available to view at:
https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
